extendedInfo.description: Wish you all a Merry Christmas. As the winter night of Christmas eve is approaching us with every passing moment, what is better than having a live wallpaper installed on your phone that continuously reminds you of the time left for the Christmas.For this purpose , we bring Christmas Countdown which is a live wallpaper that aims to increase your enthusiasm and exhilaration as one can continuously gaze at the timer and see it decreasing with every passing moment and feel the sensation of Christmas arriving slowly and slowly. The wallpaper features Santa going out in this festive season to enjoy the beautiful weather with his two cute dogs. It's fun! as you can see the countdown to Christmas day in many different units like Days, Hours, Minutes, and Seconds.In case you liked this wallpaper , then you are requested to install other similar wallpapers of our company as well.Also , it will be great if you can share the wallpaper on your facebook wall as it will make your facebook profile page more lively and full of love.Features :  Countdown in various formats like number of days, hours , minutes, and seconds as well left for Christmas. Have a joyful Christmas and a happy new year 2012.

reviews.title: Spamalicious App
reviews.comment: Cute concept really but that part didn\'t matter once my phone was gobbled up with spam spam and more spam!  Then when going in to settings...it allows you to set different fonts...fonts were decent...spelling was not, unless Christams is a new holiday that I wasn\'t made aware of.  But who needs spell check when all they really want is to force feed my phone spam...which I don\'t like...if you couldn\'t tell.  So if you and your phone are spam lovers then this is the app for you!!
